page.title: 10LIFE STYLES -CLAYBROOKE AREA
page.content: PUBLIC HOUSES Claybrooke Magna has the Woodcutter, formerly known as the Royal Oak, where home cooked bar meals are served.Also in the village is the Bull's Head which is at present undergoing changes as it is under new management. In Frolesworth the Plough and Harrow also provide bar meals and one evening a week there is some musical entertainment. Ullesthorpe Court has a restaurant,a hot and cold servery and bar snacks. It offers facilities for business conferences, weddings and other private functions. It also has its own 18-hole golf course with an outdoor-swimming pool for club members.
